★ starts at $5/m ★ KVM Unmanaged ★ Tons of space & IPs ★ Dedicated Ressources ★

Hostabulous, Business Hosting Specialist | Proudly Canadian
We have been in business since 2001 under the fusionX brand, which was targeting local business customers (Canada, Québec).
We rebranded to Hostabulous in late 2013 to provide the same service, reliability and agressive pricing to a world wide audience.

Check out our new unmanaged KVM VPS plans! Not even listed on our site yet!
